question: Scenario: You are designing a page explaining HTML learning levels. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Headings in HTML Headings: HTML Course Basics Intermediate Advanced
sampleInput: Title => Headings in HTML Headings => HTML Course (h1), Basics (h2), Intermediate (h3), Advanced (h4)
description: Create an HTML page using h1 to h4 headings correctly.

question: Scenario: You are creating the homepage of a training institute website to introduce the Full Stack course to new students. Create a webpage that displays: Title: FullStack Heading: Welcome to FullStack Training Classes Paragraph: Our training classes are designed to build strong technical skills from basics to advanced level. Students will learn concepts step by step with clear explanations and practical examples. Regular practice, assignments, and doubt-clearing sessions help improve confidence and problem-solving ability. By attending classes regularly, students gain discipline, consistency, and better understanding, which leads to success in exams, interviews, and real-time projects.
sampleInput: Title => FullStack Heading => Welcome to FullStack Training Classes Paragraph => Our training classes are designed to build strong technical skills from basics to advanced level. Students will learn concepts step by step with clear explanations and practical examples. Regular practice, assignments, and doubt-clearing sessions help improve confidence and problem-solving ability. By attending classes regularly, students gain discipline, consistency, and better understanding, which leads to success in exams, interviews, and real-time projects.
answer:
Welcome to FullStack Training Classes

Our training classes are designed to build strong technical skills from basics to advanced level. Students will learn concepts step by step with clear explanations and practical examples. Regular practice, assignments, and doubt-clearing sessions help improve confidence and problem-solving ability. By attending classes regularly, students gain discipline, consistency, and better understanding, which leads to success in exams, interviews, and real-time projects.
sampleOutput:
Welcome to FullStack Training Classes

Our training classes are designed to build strong technical skills from basics to advanced level. Students will learn concepts step by step with clear explanations and practical examples. Regular practice, assignments, and doubt-clearing sessions help improve confidence and problem-solving ability. By attending classes regularly, students gain discipline, consistency, and better understanding, which leads to success in exams, interviews, and real-time projects.
description: Create a webpage with a title, h1 heading, and a long descriptive paragraph.

question: Scenario: You are designing an About Trainer page for a training institute website to introduce the instructor and highlight important information using text-formatting tags. Create a webpage that displays: Title: FullStack Heading: Welcome to FullStack Training Classes Paragraph: Ratan Sir is an experienced Full Stack Developer and a dedicated trainer for students. Every student in Ratan Sir class is encouraged to write clean and readable code. He focuses on practical HTML, CSS, and JS lessons. Popular browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari are used to test the projects. Formatting Requirements: - Ratan Sir → Make it bold - Students word → Make it italic - Browser names → Make it small text - HTML, CSS, JS → Make it conversions () - Full Stack Developer → Marked like highlight
sampleInput: Title => FullStack Heading => Welcome to FullStack Training Classes Paragraph Text => Ratan Sir is an experienced Full Stack Developer and a dedicated trainer for students. Every student in Ratan Sir class is encouraged to write clean and readable code. He focuses on practical HTML, CSS, and JS lessons. Popular browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari are used to test the projects. Apply formatting: - Bold: "Ratan Sir" - Highlight: "Full Stack Developer" - Italic: "students" - Abbreviations: "HTML", "CSS", "JS" - Small: "Chrome", "Firefox", "Edge", "Safari"
answer:
Welcome to FullStack Training Classes

Ratan Sir is an experienced Full Stack Developer and a dedicated trainer for students. Every student in Ratan Sir class is encouraged to write clean and readable code. He focuses on practical HTML, CSS, and JS lessons. Popular browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari are used to test the projects.
sampleOutput:
Welcome to FullStack Training Classes

Ratan Sir is an experienced Full Stack Developer and a dedicated trainer for students. Every student in Ratan Sir class is encouraged to write clean and readable code. He focuses on practical HTML, CSS, and JS lessons. Popular browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari are used to test the projects.
description: Create a webpage using bold, italic, mark, small, and abbreviation tags correctly.

question: Scenario: You are designing an About Trainer page for a training institute website. This page introduces the instructor and helps students practice basic text formatting tags. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Text Formatting Tags. Heading: About Ratan Sir – Full Stack Developer & Trainer Paragraph: Students enjoy learning when concepts are explained in a simple and practical way. Ratan Sir likes to conduct sessions on the 12th day of every month to review progress and provide guidance. He often explains scientific and technical examples, such as the formula H2O, to make learning easier. Ratan Sir helps students understand complex concepts by guiding them through real-time projects that reflect industry standards. He covers frontend and backend development topics clearly, ensuring students gain confidence in both design and logic. Formatting Requirements: - 12th → Superscript - H2O → Subscript - real-time projects → Quoted text - frontend → Underlined text - backend → Deleted text - technical → Reverse text
sampleInput: Title => Text Formatting Tags. Heading => About Ratan Sir – Full Stack Developer & Trainer Paragraph Text => Students enjoy learning when concepts are explained in a simple and practical way. Ratan Sir likes to conduct sessions on the 12th day of every month to review progress and provide guidance. He often explains scientific and technical examples, such as the formula H2O, to make learning easier. Ratan Sir helps students understand complex concepts by guiding them through real-time projects that reflect industry standards. He covers frontend and backend development topics clearly, ensuring students gain confidence in both design and logic. Apply formatting: - Superscript: "12th" - Subscript: "H2O" - Quote: "real-time projects" - Underline: "frontend" - Delete: "backend" - Reverse: "technical"
answer:
About Ratan Sir – Full Stack Developer & Trainer

Students enjoy learning when concepts are explained in a simple and practical way. Ratan Sir likes to conduct sessions on the 12th day of every month to review progress and provide guidance. He often explains scientific and technical examples, such as the formula H2O, to make learning easier. Ratan Sir helps students understand complex concepts by guiding them through real-time projects that reflect industry standards. He covers frontend and backend development topics clearly, ensuring students gain confidence in both design and logic.
sampleOutput:
About Ratan Sir – Full Stack Developer & Trainer

Students enjoy learning when concepts are explained in a simple and practical way. Ratan Sir likes to conduct sessions on the 12th day of every month to review progress and provide guidance. He often explains scientific and technical examples, such as the formula H2O, to make learning easier. Ratan Sir helps students understand complex concepts by guiding them through real-time projects that reflect industry standards. He covers frontend and backend development topics clearly, ensuring students gain confidence in both design and logic.
description: Create a webpage using superscript, subscript, quote, underline, delete, and bdo tags.

question: Scenario: You are creating an instruction page for students joining a training program. Important rules must stand out clearly. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Training Instructions Heading: Guidelines for Students Paragraph: Students must attend classes regularly to achieve good results. Assignments should be completed on time. Doubt-clearing sessions are very important for understanding concepts. Students should focus on practice rather than memorizing. Formatting Requirements: - important → Make it bold - regularly → Make it italic - Assignments → Make it underlined - Doubt-clearing sessions → Make it highlighted - memorizing → Make it deleted text
sampleInput: Title => Training Instructions Heading => Guidelines for Students Paragraph Text => Students must attend classes regularly to achieve good results. Assignments should be completed on time. Doubt-clearing sessions are very important for understanding concepts. Students should focus on practice rather than memorizing. Apply formatting: - Bold: "important" - Italic: "regularly" - Underline: "Assignments" - Highlight: "Doubt-clearing sessions" - Delete: "memorizing"
answer:
Guidelines for Students

Students must attend classes regularly to achieve good results. Assignments should be completed on time. Doubt-clearing sessions are very important for understanding concepts. Students should focus on practice rather than memorizing.
sampleOutput:
Guidelines for Students

Students must attend classes regularly to achieve good results. Assignments should be completed on time. Doubt-clearing sessions are very important for understanding concepts. Students should focus on practice rather than memorizing.
description: Create a webpage using bold, italic, underline, mark, and delete tags correctly.

question: Scenario: You are creating a motivational message page for students before exams. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Motivation Heading: Message for Students Paragraph: Success comes through consistency and dedication. Students should believe in themselves and focus on learning, not shortcuts. Real-time practice leads to confidence and growth. Formatting Requirements: - Success → Make it bold - Students → Make it italic - Real-time practice → Make it quoted text - shortcuts → Make it deleted text - confidence → Make it highlighted
sampleInput: Title => Motivation Heading => Message for Students Paragraph Text => Success comes through consistency and dedication. Students should believe in themselves and focus on learning, not shortcuts. Real-time practice leads to confidence and growth. Apply formatting: - Bold: "Success" - Italic: "Students" - Quote: "Real-time practice" - Delete: "shortcuts" - Highlight: "confidence"
answer:
Message for Students

Success comes through consistency and dedication. Students should believe in themselves and focus on learning, not shortcuts. Real-time practice leads to confidence and growth.
sampleOutput:
Message for Students

Success comes through consistency and dedication. Students should believe in themselves and focus on learning, not shortcuts. Real-time practice leads to confidence and growth.
description: Create a webpage using bold, italic, quote, delete, and mark tags correctly.
